text: dea dae min almushrikin ealaa nafsih waqawmih bnzwl aleadhab elyhm, wahu waqie bihim yawm alqiamat la mhalt, lays lah mane yamnaeah min allah dhi alelw waljlal, tusaeid almalayikat wajibril 'iilayh taealaa fi yawm kan miqdaruh khamsin 'alf sanat min suniyin aldnya, wahu ealaa almumin mithl salat mktwbt
